name: Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her Minions
tooltip:
Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her MinionsLevel 51

You have been ordered to slay Vile Priestess Hexx and 20 Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guards. See Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands once this task is complete.

Vile Priestess Hexx and the Aman'zasi Guards can be found atop Jintha'alor in the Hinterlands.

Requirements:
- Vile Priestess Hexx
- Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guard x 20
